trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Broomfield
There were no other sightings in Broomfield on or around July 24th 2013
divs: sighting detailswas at work which puts me outside, around 1:50 pm july 24 2013 object headed north northeast at 500 ft. for 1\4 mile then accends to 700 to 800 ft. hovering for 10 min. then heads straight east accending and desennding.friend spotted it then i was asking whats in the sky. seemed to me a mickey mouse ballon then turned and realized it wasnt a baloon. had a friend get his binoculours and looked through them and saw three diamonds with two forming the top and black due to the alttitude.thought it was a rc airplane but too fast and to big for that i thought. went straight into the wind northwest then accends, plz tell me ballons do this. was telling everyone at work getting them into trouble trying to get as many witnesses as posissble.had my girlfriend follow it for 20 min. then lost it due to going out of site due east accending and desending the whole time.
Summary: hexagonal, three diamonds with two for top, floats by low altttude then accends to 500ft. + then heads east
